items.sentence: Let\'s all admit that Tom is a pretty good guy.
This is the kind of program Tom likes to watch.
This is the only thing that Tom ever bought me.
This matter must be dealt with sooner or later.
Can you explain the exact meaning of this word?
Can you put up some extra guests for the night?
She was absent from school because of sickness.
We won\'t be going back to Boston anytime soon.
We\'re both way too busy to help you right now.
I tried really hard to convince Tom do to that.
